PSBL_noParallax¶

class model.PSBL_noParallax¶

Bases: model.PSPL_noParallax

Methods

get_amplification(t_obs[, amp_arr]) noParallax: Get the photometric amplification term at a set of times, t.
get_astrometry(t_obs[, ast_filt_idx]) noParallax: Position of the observed source position in arcsec.
get_astrometry_unlensed(t_obs) noParallax: Get the astrometry of the source if the lens didn’t exist.
get_centroid_shift(t) noParallax: Get the centroid shift (in mas) for a list of observation times (in MJD).
get_lens_astrometry(t_obs) Equation of motion for just the foreground lens.
get_resolved_amplification(t) Get the photometric amplification term at a set of times, t for both the plus and minus images.
get_resolved_astrometry(t_obs) Get the x, y astrometry for each of the two source images, which we label plus and minus.
